member.overrides: Computes the hash value of plain text using the given hash provider instance

member.summary: Computes the hash value of plain text using the given hash provider instance
member.param: The input for which to compute the hash.

member.name: M:XB.Framework.Securitys.BaseSecurity.Cryptography.Cryptographer.CompareHash(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.overrides: Compares plain text input with a computed hash using the given hash provider instance.
member.summary: Compares plain text input with a computed hash using the given hash provider instance.
member.remarks: Use this method to compare hash values. Since hashes may contain a random "salt" value, two seperately generated hashes of the same plain text may result in different values.
member.param: The input for which you want to compare the hash to.
The hash value for which you want to compare the input to.
member.returns: true if plainText hashed is equal to the hashedText. Otherwise, false.

member.name: M:XB.Framework.Securitys.BaseSecurity.Cryptography.Cryptographer.CompareHash(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares plain text input with a computed hash using the given hash provider instance.
member.remarks: Use this method to compare hash values. Since hashes contain a random "salt" value, two seperately generated hashes of the same plain text will result in different values.
member.param: The input as a string for which you want to compare the hash to.
The hash as a string for which you want to compare the input to.
member.returns: true if plainText hashed is equal to the hashedText. Otherwise, false.

member.summary: Encrypts a secret using a specified symmetric cryptography provider.

member.returns: The resulting plain text as a string.

member.name: M:XB.Framework.Securitys.Util.LicenseUtil.ValidataLicenseKey(System.String,System.String,XB.Framework.Securitys.Util.ClientKeyModel,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 验证lic是否在授权范围之内
member.param: SRV:服务器版本lic-采用IP地址和有效期时间校验;DEV:开发版本lic-采用cpu编号有效期校验
生成lic的客户端信息，主要包含IP或者CPU信息
是否发布 true：程序已发布之验证第一次 fasle：程序未发布每次都进行验证
member.returns: true：授权范围之内可以使用;false:不可使用,已经停止授权
